name: Fun math game for kids online
name_original: Fun math game for kids online
description:
FUN MATH GAME KS1, KS2 IS GREAT GAME TO LEARN 1, 2, 3 GRADE MATH. Kids can learn counting, addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, fraction or group them together: mixed addition and subtraction, mixed multiplication and division or all four operations.

Fun math is a multiplayer game for kids (math online), that allows kids from everywhere in the world to play game with each other in the world. Kids can also play with computer, computer has four levels are easy, medium, hard and hardest.

Game play is same awesome tug of war game and car racing game. Kids get power by select the correct answer.

Kids will learn:
1. Addition
2. Subtraction
3. Multiplication ( times tables)
4. Division
5. Counting
6. Comparison
7. Fraction
